        <script><![CDATA[createSubTasks(current);

function createSubTasks(current){
 var sc = new sn_sm.SMConfiguration(); 
 var createdFromTemplate = !current.template.nil();
 var templateHasTasks = (new SMTemplates()).checkIfHasTaskTemplate(current);
 var DRAFT_STATE = 1;
 var READY_OR_QUALIFIED_STATE = 10;
 var AWAITING_APPROVAL_STATE = 11;
 var AWAITING_QUALIFICATION_STATE = 15;
 var ASSIGNED_STATE = 16;
 
 //State flow = off, create tasks from template if any
 if (!(new sn_sm.SMConfiguration()).isEnabled(current, "use_sf", "false")) {
  if (createdFromTemplate && templateHasTasks) {
   buildTemplateTasks();
   current.task_created = true;
  }
 } else {
  if (current.state == READY_OR_QUALIFIED_STATE || current.state == AWAITING_QUALIFICATION_STATE || current.state == ASSIGNED_STATE) {
   var taskDriven = !sc.isEnabled(current, "request_driven", false);
   var hasSubTask = (new SMTask()).hasSubTask(current);

   if (createdFromTemplate && templateHasTasks) {
    buildTemplateTasks();
    current.task_created = true;

   } else if (taskDriven) {
    if ((createdFromTemplate && !templateHasTasks) || !hasSubTask) {
     buildDefaultTask();
     current.task_created = true;
    }
   }
  }
  if((sc.isEnabled(current, "work_order_template_draft_state", false) && (current.state == DRAFT_STATE || current.state == AWAITING_APPROVAL_STATE))){
   if (createdFromTemplate && templateHasTasks) {
    buildTemplateTasks();
    current.task_created = true;
   }
  }
 }
}

function buildTemplateTasks() {
 GlideController.putGlobal('currOrder_' + current.sys_id, current);
 (new SMTemplates()).buildServiceOrderTasks(current);
 GlideController.removeGlobal('currOrder_' + current.sys_id);
}

function buildDefaultTask() {
 var sc = new sn_sm.SMConfiguration();
 (new SMTask()).createFirstTask(current, sc.getTaskTable(current));
}]]></script>
